= Login Example =

http://masuland.googlecode.com/files/LoginExamplePrintScreen.png

Please read the [LoginExampleFeatureSpec Feature Specification] of the Login Example application. Implementations with different Flex versions and MVC frameworks are listed below. The code follows additional Flex coding convention guidelines ([Flex3CodingConventions Flex 3], Flex 4 TODO).
